title: Skirt Fragment, 18th century
medium: Satin with warp pattern stripes and brocading; silk, metal; lined with linen
description: Deep coral pink satin with serpentines of silver-gilt leaves, small pink and coral flowers; set off by broad vertical stripes of dark brown warp ribbing with cherry-patterned guard-strips.  Broad pencil-striped selvages with cloth outer edges with heavy silk warps.  Lined with undyed glazed linen.  Pocket.  Rows of buttonholed coral silk loops across upper and lower part.

tombstone.epitaph:
Skirt Fragment, 18th century. Satin with warp pattern stripes and brocading; silk, metal; lined with linen. 
1954-170-2-a
